title: Can't import a .pst from Outlook 2021 (64-bit) to Thunderbird (64-bit).
content:
I can't import a PST file from Outlook 2021 (64-bit) to Thunderbird (64-bit).

When I reach the import screen, it starts at 33% and then doesn't move at all.

Several people have asked the same question, but is there a solution?


Also, if the import is successful, will the entire folder structure be carried over?


日本語版 outlook2021(64bit)からthunderbird(64bit)へのpstファイルインポートができません。

インポートの画面に到達すると、最初から33%の状態で始まり、その後全く動きません。 いくつか同じことについて質問している人がいますが、解決策はないのでしょうか。


また、もし、インポートに成功した場合、フォルダ構成ごと引き継がれますか？
creator: y-ono2015

title: Message selection changed.
content: Recently my message selection shortcuts changed. Until a few weeks ago, I could select a range of messages by clicking on the first, depressing shift, then clicking on the last message in the range. Since then, I have had to select a range of messages by clicking on the first, depressing ctrl+shift, then clicking on the last message in the range. What changed, and how do I change back to using only the shift key?
creator: glenn23

title: Two Thunderbird profile in two different folder and one taking up 100 GB
content:
Updating the old question I have as I have attached more detailed information.

Same profile existing in Thunderbird and one is taking up 100 GB space. The Cloud station folder was setup before, and I have no history of it, it might be a shared drive, I don't know why it takes up 100 gb of space and it has a same copy on the Users profile with lesser storage around 33 gb. Can somebody help, i'm not deleting any profiles cause I don't want to accidentally delete emails and the profile has emails older than 2020.

I need to free up some space on this machine without losing the emails as disk is getting full because of this problem.

Attached screenshots
creator: emil.jane927

title: e-mails arriving after many hours
content: My e-mail are not picked up by my Thunderbird before after many hours. On the net, I can see many e-mails that has arrived on the server, but Thunderbird are not picking them up. I have tried to delete my account and start fresh, but it does not help. What is wrong ?
